meanings.definition: A medication used to treat enlarged prostate glands in men.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed finasterides to help with my prostate problem.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of finasterides, so I had to wait for the next shipment.
meanings.sent3: After taking finasterides, I felt like a superhero with a super-powered prostate!
meanings.sent4: The effect of finasterides on my prostate was like a gentle breeze clearing away the blockage.
meanings.sent5: The image of finasterides shrinking my prostate was as clear as day in my mind.
